preqs: Students must have completed MKX9160, MKF5916, MBA5906 or MBA9006 to undertake this unit. Students enrolled in course 3802 have no prerequisites.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {3802} Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MBA9006, MKX9160} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} Otherwise true
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 11, 42, 50}

description: Traditional business disciplines are starting to appreciate the fundamental challenges presented by the application of technology to their knowledge base. In marketing the most visible agent of change has been the WWW and online transacting which has already revolutionised a number of sectors of the world economy. This unit takes marketing and traditional views of marketing and exposes then to critical analysis in the light of technological change. It explores how marketers can utilise different ways of understanding, creating, communicating and delivering customer value in the marketplace.
